ClsC_59ceeff3.class_description: Concepts related to how information is accessed and engaged with, including the broad topics people follow and the processes that expand access to that information.
ClsC_59ceeff3.evidence_excerpt: democratization of information has empowered individuals to be more informed and engaged in current events

members.entity_description: Ongoing news and developments that users become informed and engaged in.
members.resolution_context: This democratization of information has empowered individuals to be more informed and engaged in current events, sparking important conversations and debates on various social issues.

members.entity_description: Process where access to information becomes widely available beyond traditional gatekeepers.
members.resolution_context: This democratization of information has empowered individuals to be more informed and engaged in current events, sparking important conversations and debates on various social issues.

ClsC_0388dbd3.class_description: Platforms and the overarching medium that enable users to connect, share updates, and interact with user-generated content at scale.
ClsC_0388dbd3.evidence_excerpt: Platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram... and the broader concept of social media used for connecting and sharing content.

members.entity_description: A social media platform used to stay in touch and share updates, photos, and thoughts.
members.resolution_context: Platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Snapchat have made it easier than ever to stay in touch with friends, family, and acquaintances from all over the world.

members.entity_description: Online platforms and services, including social networking sites, that enable users to connect, create, share, and interact with user-generated content and with each other at scale.
members.resolution_context: Both mentions describe the same concept of online social platforms used for connecting and sharing content, with one a subtype (social networking sites) of the broader term social media.

members.entity_description: A photo and video sharing social media platform enabling users to share updates and images.
members.resolution_context: Platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Snapchat have made it easier than ever to stay in touch with friends, family, and acquaintances from all over the world.

ClsC_c7f8c290.class_description: Types of informational material that spread via social networking sites, including user-created posts and reports about recent events.
ClsC_c7f8c290.evidence_excerpt: user-generated content, news spreads rapidly through social networking sites

members.entity_description: Content such as posts, images, and videos created and shared by platform users.
members.resolution_context: With the rise of citizen journalism and user-generated content, news spreads rapidly through social networking sites, often reaching a wider audience much faster than traditional media outlets.

members.entity_description: Information and reports about recent events that spread via social networking sites.
members.resolution_context: With the rise of citizen journalism and user-generated content, news spreads rapidly through social networking sites, often reaching a wider audience much faster than traditional media outlets.

ClsC_735e6088.class_description: Categories of legacy, large-scale news distribution channels such as television, radio, and newspapers that predate social media platforms.
ClsC_735e6088.evidence_excerpt: legacy news distribution channels such as television, radio, and newspapers... mainstream media

members.entity_description: Legacy news distribution channels such as television, radio, and newspapers.
members.resolution_context: news spreads rapidly through social networking sites, often reaching a wider audience much faster than traditional media outlets.

members.entity_description: Traditional mass media outlets that historically silenced or ignored some voices.
members.resolution_context: By giving a voice to those who may have been silenced or ignored in mainstream media, social media has played a crucial role in promoting diversity, inclusion, and social activism.
